protein.specific_function: Single-stranded DNA cytidine deaminase involved in foreign DNA clearance. May trigger C-to-U hypermutation in exogenous DNA leading to its degradation. Provides cellular innate resistance to a specific panel of genetic invaders including endogenous retroelements and a subset of viruses. May have a preference for cytidines in a C-C sequence context. May also play a role in the epigenetic regulation of gene expression through the process of active DNA demethylation.

go_class.description: clearance of foreign intracellular DNA by conversion of DNA cytidine to uridine
negative regulation of viral genome replication
